text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَـٰدِلُونَ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ سُلْطَـٰنٍ أَتَىٰهُمْ ۖ كَبُرَ مَقْتًا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَعِندَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَطْبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ قَلْبِ مُتَكَبِّرٍ جَبَّارٍ

translation.en.sahih: Those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without an authority having come to them - great is hatred [of them] in the sight of Allah and in the sight of those who have believed. Thus does Allah seal over every heart [belonging to] an arrogant tyrant.
translation.id.indonesian: (Yaitu) orang-orang yang memperdebatkan ayat-ayat Allah tanpa alasan yang sampai kepada mereka. Amat besar kemurkaan (bagi mereka) di sisi Allah dan di sisi orang-orang yang beriman. Demikianlah Allah mengunci mati hati orang yang sombong dan sewenang-wenang.
